description: Housed in an old 17C hay barn near the Duomo belltower, this interesting wine bar offers around 400 different labels to accompany an array of simple yet well-prepared traditional dishes (including a few fish options). Highlights include the cured hams, cheeses and the excellent starters.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' China UnionPay', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Discover Card', ' JCB', ' Maestro', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
